title: Google\Cloud\Dataproc\V1\NodeGroupAffinity
name: NodeGroupAffinity
description:
Node Group Affinity for clusters using sole-tenant node groups.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.dataproc.v1.NodeGroupAffinity

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.node_group_uri
params.description: Required. The URI of a sole-tenant node group resource that the cluster will be created on. A full URL, partial URI, or node group name are valid. Examples: https://www.googleapis.com/compute/v1/projects/[project_id]/zones/us-central1-a/nodeGroups/node-group-1 projects/[project_id]/zones/us-central1-a/nodeGroups/node-group-1 * node-group-1

methods.name: getNodeGroupUri
methods.description:
Required. The URI of a sole-tenant node group resource that the cluster will be created on.

A full URL, partial URI, or node group name are valid. Examples:

  • https://www.googleapis.com/compute/v1/projects/[project_id]/zones/us-central1-a/nodeGroups/node-group-1
  • projects/[project_id]/zones/us-central1-a/nodeGroups/node-group-1
  • node-group-1

Generated from protobuf field string node_group_uri = 1 [(.google.api.field_behavior) = REQUIRED];
